trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> elemento num ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The `<federationConfiguration>` element contains the settings that configure the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>).
trans-unit.target: O `<federationConfiguration>` elemento contém as definições que configurar o módulo de autenticação de WS-Federation (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) e o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element configures the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> object that the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) uses to read and write cookies.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` elemento configura o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>objeto que o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) utiliza para ler e escrever os cookies.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom child configuration element, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um subordinado de personalizado o elemento de configuração, se existir.

trans-unit.source: The custom configuration element.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de configuração personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_identityConfigurationName" name="identityConfigurationName" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_identityConfigurationName" name="identityConfigurationName" href=""> </xref> atributo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref> section to associate with this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> secção a associar a este <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been configured with non-default values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este elemento foi configurado com valores não predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has been configured with non-default values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tiver sido configurado com valores não predefinida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""> </xref> atributo.

trans-unit.source: The `name` attribute sets the name to associate with this `<federationConfiguration>` element.
trans-unit.target: O `name` atributo define o nome a associar a este `<federationConfiguration>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: If the Name property is `null`, the current element is the default federation configuration.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade nome é `null`, o elemento de atual é a configuração de Federação predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The name of this federation configuration element.
trans-unit.target: O nome deste elemento de configuração de Federação.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<serviceCertificate>` element provides location and validation settings for the X.509 certificate that is used to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
trans-unit.target: O `<serviceCertificate>` elemento fornece definições de localização e validação do certificado x.&509; que é utilizada para encriptar e desencriptar tokens.

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<wsFederation>` element provides configuration for the WS-Federation Configuration Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>).
trans-unit.target: O `<wsFederation>` elemento fornece configuração para o módulo de configuração do WS-Federation (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O subordinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""> </xref> elemento.
